Ordered this set as an outfit for a wedding. Each one I received basically looks like they have been used or dirty.  There’s pilling on one top, hairs found on another, and the pants covered in lint/pet hair. The one set that didn’t look used had some black marks on the shirt.

This set was purchased for my 6 year old to wear to a wedding.  I hoped to get a single wear out of it.  The fit was perfect, and my son enjoyed wearing it.  Because he's a 6 year old boy, he later spent a couple of hours during the reception playing football, soccer and some type of wrestling contest wearing the pants the entire evening including a quick downpour, although at some point the shirt came off.  Somehow with some stain treatment and a single wash both shirt and pants were good as new (please note I did not intend to really use a second time and did not look at the washing instructions, these may not be washing machine recommended).  That said, the outfit survived the washing machine, and I ironed everything back to good as new.  There was a little room to grow, so I'm confident if we have a need again before he grows out of the pants this set can be worn again.

This outfit was perfect for the wedding we attended. The material of both the pants and the shirt was soft and breathable - which is always a worry for those of us with little kids. The fit was perfect for our little guy. He’s 19 months and tall, but the 18-24 size fit perfectly. The elasticity of the pants was appropriate. I didn’t realize the bow tie was sewn on - made things super easy. High quality fabric and suspenders, the thickness was about right. Didn’t feel cheap despite the reasonable price tag. Very happy with this purchase and will purchase from again!
